pipelineMaintenance.title: Pipeline Maintenance
pipelineMaintenance.description: Keeping pipelines safe with pipeline coating.

siddhivinayak.name: Siddhivinayak
siddhivinayak.description: Iconic temple in Mumbai dedicated to Lord Ganesha, known for fulfilling devotees’ wishes.
siddhivinayak.visitOrder: Main Entrance → Darshan Queue → Ganesha Idol → Circumambulation → Prasad Counter

tirumala.name: Tirumala
tirumala.description: Famous hill temple in Andhra Pradesh.
tirumala.visitOrder: Koneti Snanum → Varaha Swamy → Lord Sri Venkateswara → Prasadam → Alivelu Mangapuram

jagannathPuri.name: Jagannath Puri
jagannathPuri.description: Sacred temple in Odisha, part of Char Dham pilgrimage.
jagannathPuri.visitOrder: Bada Danda → Jagannath Temple → Gundicha Temple

meenakshiAmman.name: Meenakshi Amman
meenakshiAmman.description: Historic temple in Madurai, Tamil Nadu, known for its architecture.
meenakshiAmman.visitOrder: Meenakshi Sundareswarar → Golden Lotus Tank → Thousand Pillar Hall

somnath.name: Somnath
somnath.visitOrder: Triveni Sangam → Somnath Temple → Bhalka Tirtha

vaishnoDevi.name: Vaishno Devi
vaishnoDevi.description: Holy cave shrine in Jammu and Kashmir.
vaishnoDevi.visitOrder: Katra → Ban Ganga → Vaishno Devi Cave → Bhairon Temple

sabarimala.name: Sabarimala
sabarimala.description: Hill temple in Kerala, known for its strict pilgrimage rituals.

goldenTemple.name: Golden Temple
goldenTemple.description: Sikh spiritual center in Amritsar, Punjab.
goldenTemple.visitOrder: Amrit Sarovar → Harmandir Sahib → Langar Hall

kedarnath.name: Kedarnath
kedarnath.description: Jyotirlinga temple in the Himalayas, Uttarakhand.

hanumanGarhi.name: Hanuman Garhi (Tuesday Special)
hanumanGarhi.description: Tuesday is dedicated to Hanuman for strength and protection.

dwarkadhishTemple.name: Dwarkadhish Temple (Wednesday Special)
dwarkadhishTemple.description: Wednesday is ideal for Krishna worship, for knowledge and peace.
dwarkadhishTemple.visitOrder: Gomti Ghat → Dwarka Darshan → Rukmini Temple

shaniShingnapur.name: Shani Shingnapur (Saturday Special)
shaniShingnapur.description: Saturday is for Shani Dev – remover of karmic obstacles.

mahalakshmiTemple.name: Mahalakshmi Temple (Friday Special)
mahalakshmiTemple.description: Friday is best to seek blessings of wealth and harmony.
mahalakshmiTemple.visitOrder: Main Shrine → Lakshmi Idol → Prasad Counter

konarkSunTemple.name: Konark Sun Temple (Sunday Special)
konarkSunTemple.description: Sunday is the day of Sun God, best for vitality and health.
konarkSunTemple.visitOrder: Chariot View → Natya Mandap → Surya Idol

shirdiSaiBabaTemple.name: Shirdi Sai Baba Temple (Thursday Special)
shirdiSaiBabaTemple.description: Thursday is Guru's day, best for visiting Sai Baba temples.
